Verses: 1 aaraam Varushaththu Aaraam Maadham Aindhaanthedhiyile, Naan En Veettil Utkaarndhirukkirapodhum, Yoodhaavin Mooppargal Enakku Munbaaga Utkaarndhirukkirapodhum, Karththaraagiya Aandavarudaiya Karam Ange Enmel Amarndhadhu.
2 appozhudhu Idho, Akkinichchaayalaaith Thondrugira Oruvaraik Kanden; Avarudaiya Iduppukkuk Keezhellaam Akkiniyum Avarudaiya Iduppukku Melellaam Sogusaavaippol Pragaasikkira Saayalumaayirundhadhu.

3 kaipol Thondrinadhai Avar Neetti, En Thalaimayiraip Pidiththu Ennaith Thookkinaar, Aaviyaanavar Ennai Boomikkum Vaanaththukkum Naduve Kondupoi, Dhevadharisanaththile Ennai Erusalemil Vadathisaikku Edhiraana Ulvaasalin Nadaiyile Vittaar; Ange Erichchalundaakkugira Vikkiragaththin Sthaanam Irundhadhu.
4 idho, Naan Pallaththaakkile Kandirundha Dharisanaththukku Sariyaaga Isravelin Dhevanudaiya Magimai Ange Vilanginadhu.

5 avar Ennaip Paarththu; Manupuththirane, Un Kangalai Ereduththu, Vadakke Paar Endraar; Appozhudhu Naan En Kangalai Ereduththu, Vadakke Paarththen; Idho, Palipeedaththin Vaasalukku Vadakke Paarththen; Nadaiyile Erichchalundaakkugira Andha Vikkiragam Irundhadhu.

6 avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Avargal Seygiradhaik Kaangiraayaa? En Parisuththa Sthalaththaivittu Ennai Dhooramaaip Pogappannumpadiyaana Isravel Vamsaththaar Inge Seygira Migundha Aruvaruppugalaik Kaangiraai Allavaa? Idhilum Adhiga Aruvaruppugalai Innamum Kaanbaai Endru Solli,
7 ennaip Praagaaraththin Vaasalukkuk Konduponaar; Appozhudhu Idho, Suvaril Oru Dhuvaaraththaik Kanden.
8 avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Nee Suvarile Dhuvaaramidu Endraar; Naan Suvarile Dhuvaaramittapodhu, Idho, Oru Vaasal Irundhadhu.
9 avar Ennaippaarththu: Nee Ulle Poi, Avargal Inge Seygira Kodiya Aruvaruppugalaip Paar Endraar.

10 naan Ulle Poip Paarththa Podhu, Idho, Sagalavidha Oorumpraanigalum Aruvaruppaana Mirugangalumaagiya Ivaigalin Suroobangalum, Isravel Vamsaththaarudaiya Naragalaana Sagala Vikkiragangalum Suvaril Sutrilum Siththirantheerappattirundhana.

11 isravel Vamsaththaarin Moopparil Ezhubadhuperum, Avargalin Naduvile Saappaanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yasaniyaavum, Avanavan Thanthan Kaiyile Thanthan Thoobakalasaththaip Pidiththukkondu, Avaigalukku Munbaaga Nindraargal, Thoobavarkkaththinaal Migundha Pugai Ezhumbitru.

12 appozhudhu Avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Isravel Vamsaththaarin Mooppargal Andhagaaraththile Avaravar Thangal Vikkiragangalin Siththira Vinodha Araigalil Seygiradhai Nee Kandaayaa? Karththar Engalaip Paarkkiradhillai; Karththar Dhesaththaik Kaivittaar Endru Sollugiraargale Endraar.
13 pinnum Avargal Seygira Adhiga Aruvaruppugalai Innamum Kaanbaai Endru Avar Ennudane Solli,
14 ennaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththu Vadakku Vaasalin Nadaiyile Kondu Ponaar; Idho, Ange Thammoosukkaaga Azhudhukondirukkira Sthreegal Utkaarndhirundhaargal.
15 appozhudhu Avar: Manupuththirane, Idhaik Kandaayaa? Idhilum Adhiga Aruvaruppugalai Innamum Kaanbaai Endru Ennudane Solli,

16 ennaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Utpraagaaraththile Konduponaar; Idho, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Vaasal Nadaiyile Mandabaththukkum Palipeedaththukkum Naduve, Erakkuraiya Irubaththaindhu Purushar, Thangal Mudhugaidh Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkum Thangal Mugaththaik Keezhththisaikkum Neraagath Thiruppinavargalaaik Kizhakke Irukkum Sooriyanai Namaskariththaargal.

17 appozhudhu Avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Idhaik Kandaayaa? Inge Yoodhaa Vamsaththaar Seygira Aruvaruppugal Arpamaana Kaariyamaa? Avargal Dhesaththaik Kodumaiyinaal Nirappi Ennai Adikkadi Kobamoottugiraargal; Idho, Avargal Dhraatchakkilaiyaith Thangal Naasikku Neraagap Pidikkiraargal.

18 aagaiyaal Naanum Ukkiraththode Kaariyaththai Nadaththuven; En Kan Thappaviduvadhillai, Naan Iranguvadhillai; Avargal Magaa Saththamaai En Sevigal Ketkak Kooppittaalum Avargalukku Naan Sevikoduppadhillai Endraar.
